availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Muhlenberg County, KY. A Kentucky-born farmer. Son of James and Peggy Wilkins.

bibl.p: Kentucky. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910). Microfilm rolls #994050, death record of Elijah Wilkins, Muhlenberg County, KY, 30 Nov 1875. Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Subdivision 2, p. 473.
